articles.title: Umair Durrani
articles.contents:
Umair Durrani
          
          
          About
          Blog
          R Gems
          
          
          Tutorials
           
          ▾
          
          
          Segmented
          R for Driving Sim
          Ontario Weather Dashboard
          Short Intro. to Data Science
          Short Intro. to ggplot2
          Interactive Plotting in R
          Histogram y axis
          Decision Tree Example
          BBC 100 Women
          Hypothesis Test for Population Mean
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Umair Durrani
          
          
            
              I am a PhD student in Civil and Environmental Engineering at University of Windsor. My research is about driver behavior and its role in traffic safety in mixed traffic flow. I love R and Rstudio. Download my resume.
              You know my name, now tell me yours:
              
              
            
            
              I am a PhD student in Civil and Environmental Engineering at University of Windsor. My research is about driver behavior and its role in traffic safety in mixed traffic flow. I love R and Rstudio. Download my resume.
              You know my name, now tell me yours:

articles.title: Umair Durrani, Ph.D.
articles.contents:
Umair Durrani
          
          
          About
          Blog
          R Gems
          
          
          Tutorials
           
          ▾
          
          
          Segmented
          R for Driving Sim
          Ontario Weather Dashboard
          Short Intro. to Data Science
          Short Intro. to ggplot2
          Interactive Plotting in R
          Histogram y axis
          Decision Tree Example
          BBC 100 Women
          Hypothesis Test for Population Mean
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Umair Durrani, Ph.D.
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Google Scholar
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        

          
            
            
            
            Welcome to my website!
            
            I am a research associate in transportation engineering
            at the Civil and
            Environmental Engineering department at the University of
            Windsor. I design, run, and analyze experiments to
            understand driver behaviour. Moreover, I teach programmatic
            data analysis to students in the Transportation Systems
            Innovation Lab.
            I am also an instructor of data
            analytics at St. Clair College, Windsor, Ontario. I
            teach analytical tools (Python, R, Tableau, Excel),
            Statistics and manage capstone projects of students from
            diverse backgrounds.
            I speak English, Urdu
            and R (programming) fluently. You can get
            in touch with me via email or twitter.
            
            
            .columnname {
              font-size: 1.4rem; 
              font-weight: 600;
            }
            .grad-item {
              list-style: none; 
              background-image: url(graduation-cap-solid.png); 
              background-repeat: no-repeat;  
              background-size: 1.2rem; 
              padding-left: 2rem;
            }
            .grad-location {
              font-size: 0.8rem;
              color: grey;
            }
            
            
            Interests
            Intelligent Transportation Systems
            Driver Behaviour
            Autonomous Vehicles
            Spatiotemporal Analysis of Transportation
            Networks
            
            
            Education
            PhD in Civil Engineering, 2022
            
            
            University of Windsor, Ontario, Canada
            
            B.Sc. in Transportation Engineering,
            2009 
            
            University of Engineering and Technology, Lahore,
            Pakistan
            
            
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Umair Durrani, Ph.D.
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      LinkedIn
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Google Scholar
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Twitter
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      GitHub
                    
                  
                                  
              
            
            
              
              
              
              Welcome to my website!

              at the Civil
              and Environmental Engineering department at the University
              of Windsor. I design, run, and analyze experiments to
              understand driver behaviour. Moreover, I teach
              programmatic data analysis to students in the
              Transportation Systems Innovation Lab.
              I am also an instructor of data
              analytics at St. Clair College, Windsor, Ontario. I
              teach analytical tools (Python, R, Tableau, Excel),
              Statistics and manage capstone projects of students from
              diverse backgrounds.
              I speak English, Urdu
              and R (programming) fluently. You can get
              in touch with me via email or twitter.

                background-size: 1.2rem; 
                padding-left: 2rem;
              }
              .grad-location {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
                color: grey;
              }
              
              
              Interests
              Intelligent Transportation Systems
              Driver Behaviour
              Autonomous Vehicles
              Spatiotemporal Analysis of Transportation
              Networks
              
              
              Education
              PhD in Civil Engineering, 2022
